title: Women's wedding blouse (Huipil)
description: One panel huipil with embroidered, round-cut neck opening; indigo ground cloth with multicolored silk embroidery of floral and bird motifs. Possibly tree of life in center, vase at bottom; two large quetzals in center, nine small birds scattered throughout design. Primarily satin stitch, some herringbone, cross, stem stitches.
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons, in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
